trait.name: Trampling Charge
text: If the oliphaunt moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
If the target is prone, the oliphaunt can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Trunk Slam
text: If the oliphaunt starts its turn with a target grappled, it can slam the target into the ground as a bonus action. The creature must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 11 (2d10) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. This doesn't end the grappled condition on the target.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The oliphaunt uses its trunk, then it makes one gore or stomp attack.

action.name: Gore
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 30 (5d8 + 8) piercing damage.

action.name: Stomp
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 35 (5d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Trunk
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. The target is grappled (escape DC 17) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained and the oliphaunt can't use its trunk on another target.

action.name: Tusk Sweep (Recharge 5-6)
text: The oliphaunt sweeps its tusks in a wide arc. Each creature in a 20-foot cube must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 (10d6) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
